title: Clinical Neurology 8/E
features: The text that bridges the gap between basic neuroscience and clinical practice – updated with the latest advances and full-color illustrations

has helped students, residents, and clinicians understand the link between basic neuroscience and current approaches in diagnosis and treatment. Distinguished by its practice-oriented approach to neurology based on presenting symptoms, this trusted classic delivers the clearest and most concise introduction to the field available anywhere.
Essential concepts are presented within a framework of problems encountered in a clinical setting for greater relevance to real-world practice
